# behaviour.change.analysis

<!-- badges: start -->
![Experimental](https://img.shields.io/badge/status-experimental-orange)

This package provides[^1] functions to analyse behavioural questionnaire data.

[^1]: Well, with luck it eventually will.

DO NOT USE THIS PACKAGE IT IS IN EARLY DEVELOPMENT

## Installation

You can install the development version of behaviour.change.analysis from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("pak")
pak::pak("idem-lab/behaviour.change.analysis")
```
